title: COVID-19: Pakistan extends suspension of domestic flight operations till May 13
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 10 (APP):Pakistan on Sunday extended the suspension of domestic flight operations till May 13 in line with the national strategy to contain the spread of novel coronavirus (COVID-19).
“As per the government decision, the suspension of domestic flight operations, as effected earlier, has been extended up to Wednesday, May 13, 2020 at 2359 hours PST,” a spokesman for the Aviation Division said in a news release.
Remaining provisions as applicable to the suspension of domestic flights, reflected in the previous orders, would remain unchanged, he added.
On March 26, the government had suspended all types of domestic scheduled /non scheduled, chartered and private aircraft passenger flight operations for a period of one week initially.
Later, the suspension had been getting extensions from time to time in view of the COVID-19 evolving situation in the country.
